title: I Am Pilgrim
description: A young woman murdered in a run-down Manhattan hotel.A father publicly beheaded in the blistering sun of Saudi Arabia. A man's eyes stolen from his living body as he leaves a secret Syrian research laboratory.Smouldering human remains on a mountainside in the Hindu Kush.A plot to commit an appalling crime against humanity. One thread that binds them all.One man to take the journey.Pilgrim.
author: Terry Hayes
